category: Member Sports Organization Regulations/Article 19-2 (Registration of Candidates for Presidential Election)
contents: Article 19-2 (Registration of Candidates for Presidential Election) ① Candidates for presidential election must apply for candidate registration in writing to the relevant member sports organization and pay a deposit at the time of registration. Revised December 20, 2018. ② Matters necessary for the election of the president of the member sports organization, such as the documents to be submitted for registration of presidential candidates and the amount of deposit for each member sports organization, shall be separately determined by the member sports organization in accordance with the ‘Chairman Election Management Regulations’ of the Sports Association. After that, approval from the Sports Council must be obtained. However, it is limited to regular and associate member organizations. [This article was newly established on December 20, 2018]
